announcements.title: Sunday Worship Services
announcements.text: Join us every Sunday at 10:00 AM for inspiring worship, powerful preaching, and wonderful fellowship. Our services include contemporary worship music, children's ministry, and a welcoming atmosphere for all ages.

announcements.title: Community Thanksgiving Dinner
announcements.text: Bring your family and friends for a special Thanksgiving celebration! We'll share a delicious meal together and give thanks for God's blessings. Please sign up in the church lobby or contact the office. Volunteers needed!

announcements.title: Youth Bible Study
announcements.text: Calling all youth ages 12-18! Join us for an engaging Bible study where we explore God's Word, build friendships, and grow together in faith. Snacks provided. Bring a friend!

announcements.title: Christmas Choir Practice
announcements.date: Starting November 1, 2025 - Every Tuesday at 7:00 PM
announcements.text: Get ready for our Christmas celebration! The choir is preparing special music for the season. No audition required - all voices welcome. Join us in making beautiful music for the Lord.

announcements.title: Women's Ministry Brunch
announcements.text: Ladies, join us for a morning of fellowship, encouragement, and inspiration. Guest speaker Sister Grace Johnson will share about 'Finding Joy in Every Season.' RSVP by November 5th.

announcements.title: Men's Prayer Breakfast
announcements.text: Men of faith, gather with us for breakfast, prayer, and discussion. This month we're focusing on 'Leading Your Family with Purpose.' All men are welcome - invite your sons, fathers, and brothers!

announcements.title: Community Service Day
announcements.text: Let's serve our community together! We'll be partnering with the local food bank and helping with neighborhood cleanup. Lunch provided. Sign up at the welcome desk.

announcements.title: New Member Class
announcements.text: Interested in becoming a member of ELT? Join Pastor Michael for a four-week class covering our beliefs, mission, and how to get involved. Classes meet after Sunday service. Register at the church office.
